name: Leonard Sloan
text: Great school really enjoyed my time there wonderful instructors and nice people in the office.. If you’re thinking about coming to ESD I would recommend all you have to do is listen follow instructions and have a positive attitude and you will get your cdl.. THANK YOU ALL at ESD

name: Jeff Faulk
text: The instructors are top notch and very knowledgeable. They will guide and teach you and if you can listen and be open minded to what they are telling you you can earn your CDL. Thank you Paul, Bobby, Dan, and Ron for getting me started the right way and sharing your knowledge. I will always remember my time here, one of the most difficult, but fulfilling experiences I have ever had. The school office staff will help you any way they can to get you on your way to a rewarding career. Thank you ESD Decatur, Alabama.

resp.text: Thank you Jeff.  We are glad you choose ESD School and looking forward to hearing about your success out there and congratulations.

name: Jordan Odom
text: Great school.. you will do great if you get out there and focus, as well as get as much practice and ask as many questions as you can

resp.text: Thank-you and we look forward to hearing about your success out there on the road!

name: Laquisha Grant
text: Really enjoyed my time there.  If you want laughter and a great instructor this is the place to be. Harry and Ron are great instructors. Harry you had us ready in a day in a half. Thanks to the entire team it’s been real.

resp.text: Thank you for coming to ESD! We are so glad you stuck with it and we are excited to see where your future takes you! If you need anything at all, you know you can always call us! Good Luck Laquisha!

name: Thomas Overall
text:
The instructors are tough but fare. They get you the knowledge you need to get your CDL. They also share the knowledge that they have gained in years of driving.  I'm very  happy to have chosen this school.
Yeah. It gets really hot on the yard pads for maneuvers so bring lots of cold water.

resp.text: Thanks for choosing us here at ESD and Congrats!

name: Dontrell Nance
text: This school is so smooth , from the begin to the end everybody stays the same nobody gets frustrated with you . Daniel and Paul explains everything so simple your only choice is the right way ! “ now slideeeeee that trailer in there real pretty “

resp.text: Thanks, we appreciate you for selecting ESD School.

name: Shaun Raines
text: Great school. All practical application.  Shut you mouth, listen to your instructors,  and they will show you how to do it.  Ask questions when you want to know something.

resp.text: Thank you sir!!

name: Alec Pointer
text: Great school to attend, also great people and instructors that are willing to help you! Overall good experience!

resp.text: We are so glad you chose us here at ESD School! Good luck to you!!!!

name: Mack Florida
text: ESD was great. Jerry, Jack, Stefan lol not sure if I got his spelling right, Bobby, Ron, and Dan were all awesome people that really just want you to succeed. Charles and the ladies up front are as helpful and kind as they can be. Loved every second of my ESD experience. Big thanks from Mack Florida.

resp.text: Thank you for selecting ESD School LLC.

name: cazador del mar
text: You might feel like your not get all that much attention in the first week. Don't worry at all you will get all the time you need to get your Cdl. Every single instructor has 25+ years experience. The instructors are in place to guide and help you from the beginning to end. The school provides a hotel room but you will have a room mate. You can also choose to spend $300 more to have your own room for all three weeks. It's nothing fancy. Just a basic room for resting. Make sure to bring an ice chest and a fold up chair. By the second week I had 8 job offers.  This is a 3 week class. They will provide lunch Tuesday and Friday. Hope this help anyone looking for a school. Happy safe trucking to all!!

resp.text: Thanks for choosing ESD School LLC.    Happy Safe Trucking!

name: Brandon Kellingsworth
text: This is a great School the instructor Paul if it wasn't for him helping me with my pre-trip I would not have got my CDL thank you very much Paul and esd and Ron for helping me learn how to drive on the road test thank you also the instructor Dan runs a tight ship around there thank you guys

resp.text: Thank-you for your feed back.  We are glad your choose ESD School and happy you are on your way to a new career.

name: James Glasgow
text: Great from the office staff to the instructors excellent training in 17 days amazing thanks to all at ESD in the words of Mr Ron off the clutch excearate JDGLASGOW class of 12 /2/2019

resp.text: Thanks James.

name: itz zay
text: Paul and stefan helped very great and jack I would recommend put in the work trucking isnt easy but hard work. Passed on my second week

resp.text: Thanks, we love seeing student success and new careers.

name: Maurice McLean
text: Great school, they are very funny & entertaining. They make it very fun & calm your nerves. If you want it you will pass mind over matter👍🏿👍🏿👍🏿 -Maurice

resp.text: Thank you Maurice

name: Andrew Springer
text: Great instructors and newer equipment. Just got 3 or 4 2013 model Pro Stars. Instructors are extremely knowledgeable and experienced and will do anything they can to prepare you and help you get your CDL. As a recent graduate, I highly recommend this school.

resp.text: Thanks for selecting ESD School LLC.

name: Cody Caraballo
text: Great school and caring instructors!!! All of them aren't there for a paycheck they actually want to see you succeed! Good people at heart and are willing to help those who want to help themselves. Great tools to work with too!

resp.text: Thanks for selecting ESD School LLC

name: Ava Wright
text: This school by far is the greatest trucking school ever the instructors are great and Wendy and Charles are also pretty great themselves. If you ever have a problem or need something taken care of Wendy will be sure to handle it for you and Charles is pretty awsome as well when I couldn't find a job Charles made sure he help me with the apps and I eventually got a job. Dan, I just want you to know I really appreciate you believing in me the way you did without that I just don't know where I would be today. P dog thanks for keeping a sense of humor and thanks for making day's seem a little shorter than what they really were but always seem to have a way with keeping learning fun, Steph thanks for teaching me how to tweek my 90 to where it worked in perfectly and last but not least Ron and Jack thanks for having more patience and faith with us all and I know it really has been a challenge but you guy's did one thing that meant alot to us and that's kept the faith lol Just know the staff is awsome and will get you to rolling within 3 weeks and sometimes less than that so please keep them in mind you will not regret it!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Jesse Thomas
text: They should train with 53 ft trailers . tanker. And flatbeds  totes with half full of water . that would give the students a taste of the real receiving life.they would learn how to shift and stop .other that good school.

resp.text: Thanks for your review.   ESD trains students to obtain their license and move onto the next level of training with loads and transportation companies.   We are not training you to drive a truck, we are training to get your CDL.  We do have 53 Ft trailers and we actually utilize both in training.  We do appreciate your feed back.

name: Eric Hattery
text: Been there twice back in 2004 (different name) and back in 2014 for my refresher. No complaints.

resp.text: Thanks for selecting ESD School.

name: The bold sales
text: Best school ever I never thought one in a million times in my mind that it was easy to drive an semi tractor trailer

resp.text: Glad you got what you came for!

name: Zachary Sargent
text: Great school with caring employees!

resp.text: Thank you  and Thank you for choosing ESD School LLC.

name: Erik Warrington
text: Great  school . Patient and  always willing to  help you learn.

resp.text: Thanks Michael, we really enjoy training students!

name: Jeffery Campbell
text: I just got my CDL License they know their stuff and I will tell anyone that wants to get their CDL License to go there IF you listen to them you will have them in just 3 weeks

resp.text: Thank-you for choosing ESD School LLC Theodore/Mobile location.  Stay safe out there on the highways.

name: spencer smith
text: Great team to train under. They even took some extra time with me to make sure I could succeed in my goals.

resp.text: Thank-you

name: Allen Bush
text: Best School in America!#facts###

resp.text: Thank-you.

name: Jamar Thomas
text: Great school!! I highly recommend them

resp.text: Thanks for selecting ESD School LLC.

name: Brandon Barry
text: Great Training ang great Instructors

resp.text: Thanks we are glad you choose ESD School for your training.

name: Bizizbiz Bam
text: This place is The Real McCoy.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Raymond Smith
text: GREAT SCHOOL..

resp.text: Thank-you

name: Newest Mason Wilson
text: Great thanks Lynn, Micheal, and Lasharsky!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Wilson
